mapper.insert: insert into question (title, description, get_create, get_modified, creator, tag) values (#{title}, #{description}, #{getCreate}, #{getModified}, #{creator}, #{tag})
mapper.select: select * from question where creator = #{userId} limit #{offset}, #{size}
mapper.update: update question set title = #{title}, description = #{description}, get_modified = #{getModified}, tag = #{tag} where id = #{id}
